title: Improved carbohydrate metabolism after physical training and dietary intervention in individuals with the ‘atherothrombogenic syndrome’. Oslo Diet and Exercise Study (ODES). A randomized trial
abstract: Objectives. To compare the single and joint effect of 1‐year diet and exercise intervention on carbohydrate metabolism and associated coronary risk variables.
explanation: This paper is directly related to the source paper as it is part of the Oslo Diet and Exercise Study (ODES) and investigates the effects of diet and exercise intervention on carbohydrate metabolism, which is closely linked to the source paper's findings on blood pressure and coronary heart disease risk factors.
